query.name: selectUserQuery
query.value: SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = '?' AND password = '?'

query.name: selectRoleQuery
query.value: SELECT role FROM Users, PrivilegeRole WHERE Users.roleId = PrivilegeRole.roleId AND Users.username = '?'
